BEGIN TRANSACTION
GO
ALTER TABLE dbo.case_opt ADD
	rectitle_name varchar(320) NULL,
	send_way varchar(2) NULL,
	receipt_type varchar(1) NULL,
	receipt_title varchar(1) NULL
GO
ALTER TABLE dbo.bstep_temp SET (LOCK_ESCALATION = TABLE)
GO
COMMIT


update opt_detail set draw_file='D:\Data\Document\NT\temp\20100428013.jpg' where opt_sqlno in(2587)
update opt_detail set draw_file='/btbrt/NT/temp/20170426014.jpg' where opt_sqlno in(2588)
update opt_detail set draw_file='/btbrt/NT/7/26/72677.jpg' where opt_sqlno in(2589)


select draw_file,* from opt_detail where opt_sqlno in(2453,2587,2588,2589)
select opt_detail from br_opt where opt_sqlno in(2453,2587,2588,2589)
